title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1003.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1003.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the purpose of this Part to establish a prompt payment
policy for the Community Facilities Project Guarantee Fund (Fund), to set forth
the standards for the payment of bills by the Fund within specific periods of
time and to prescribe interest penalties in situations where payments do not
conform to these standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1003.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
